titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the St. Michael's Episcopal Church, Cascade, Michigan, records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: St. Michael's Episcopal Church, Cascade, Michigan, records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: 1976-1997 files in box 1; 1998-2007 files in box 2.

archdesc.bioghist: St. Michael's Episcopal Church was established in 1960 as a mission of Grace Episcopal Church, Grand Rapids. The church became a parish in 1980, but was merged with Holy Cross Episcopal Church, Kentwood, Mich., in 2007. The church's mailing address was in Grand Rapids, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Vestry records include agendas, minutes of meetings, minutes of annual parish meetings, financial records, and miscellaneous reports.
